title: evvuyirkkum anbu
sahitya:
evvuyirkkum anbu sheidiDuvAi manamE ivvulaga vAzhviladu sukhamE


anupallavi

  kavvu pashi-yATrungAl kaN malarndu mughandirundum shevvidanai kAnbadilum shIriyadO-rinbam uNDO


caraNam    pongi ezhun-karuNaiyuDan pullyirkkum tuyar kaLaindAl anguLattil mozhiyaraiyA tarumbum nanri-yamudamanrO 
engum nirai paramporuL tAn tangumuyirk-kOyilavai mangiyavam-AghAmal ingidam shEr paNi purivAi
